Event Description: February 2024: A young man was stripped naked, physically assaulted and dragged through the streets fully naked.
January 2024: A young woman was kidnapped from her home and sexually abused by mercenary forces.
January 2022: In Ituri province, a woman was killed after her sexual organs were cut out by a member of the FRPI.
Reported Perpetrator Name: FRPI Front for Patriotic Resistance in Ituri

Event Description: July 2024: A woman was kidnapped and raped by three armed men in a valley. She was then taken to their residence and repeatedly ganged raped for several days. She later escaped.
June 2023: 11 women were raped by Sudanese Armed Forces.

May 2024: A girl was raped by a member of the CNDD-FDD party after being kidnapped by the perpetrator and taken to his house. The victim was taken to hospital for medical treatment and the perpetrator detained.
Reported Perpetrator Name: Conseil National Pour la Défense de la Démocratie–Forces pour la Défense de la Démocratie (Burundi)

Event Description: July 2023: A woman was raped by a SSPDF soldier.
December 2023: a male Palestinian detainee was hand bound semi-naked on a chair inside a college whilst being interrogated by Israeli forces. The incident was recorded and uploaded on Youtube.
April 2023: A woman was raped by three G-9 gang members after they stabbed and killed her brother. They warned her that they would kill her if she spoke to the media.
September 2020: Two nurses and an unknown number of patients were raped by 14 armed men. They stole money and blood stocks and robbed several patients.
January 2021: In Tigray, two Tigrayan women were captured and raped for 28 days by four Eritrean soldiers. This incident was reported on 11 August 2021

November 2020: In Sanmatenga province, a group of 10 women were raped by gunmen whilst collecting straw in the bush near the village. The governor of the Centre-Nord region denied that the event had occurred in a later statement.

Event Description: June 2021: Two women were raped by 3R rebels from CPC. The rebels also looted all the women's belongings and assaulted civilians.

Reported Perpetrator Name: Armed Forces of the Russian Federation

Event Description: June 2021: In Shan state, a 14-year-old ethnic Ta’ang Buddhist nun was raped by a soldier who was stationed at the monastery. She was offered 500,000 kyat and asked to leave the monastery out of fear that the news would spread.
Weapon Carried/Used: No Information on the Weapon Used

Event Description: February 2022: In Amhara region, a 14-year-old female student and her mother were raped inside their home by two TPLF fighters, one of whom was wearing military clothing.
January 2025: A woman was abducted and raped by Ethiopian National Defense Force (ENDF) members.

Event Description: August 2025: A girl was raped by at least three members of the Defense Forces. She was referred to a medical facility. Regime soldiers warned her parents not to take the matter to court.
Weapon Carried/Used: No Information on the Weapon Used

Event Description: November 2024: An unspecified number of women were sexually abused by Rapid Support Forces (RSF) soldiers while the soldiers controlled the city for a week.

December 2023: A couple and their child were tortured, raped and killed by members of the United Cartels.

July 2021: In Rakhin state, a minor girl was raped inside an unspecified IDP camp.
November 2021: An unidentified armed group raped refugee IDP women from Burundi in Lusenda camp, where they also looted cows from pastoralists. 1000 Burundian refugees were displaced.
June 2024: A woman and a girl were sexually and physically assaulted by two Taliban soldiers.

July 2021: In North Kivu province, at least six women were abducted from their homes and raped in nearby bushes by pastoralists from the Lukochu area. A nurse at the health clinic, where the women received medical care, stated that the frequency of abductions and sexual assaults committed by pastoralists in the area has become very concerning.

Event Description: February 2024: An unspecified number of people were stripped naked by unidentified armed men. The victims were supporters of the newly elected traditional ruler of the community while the perpetrators were affiliated to a serving Commissioner.
